meanings.definition: Resembling a berry in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The small, bacciform fruit was juicy and sweet.
meanings.sent2: The bacciform plant produced colorful berries.
meanings.sent3: She found a bacciform berry that looked like a tiny balloon.
meanings.sent4: The bacciform decorations on the cake added a pop of color.
meanings.sent5: The bacciform shape of the pendant made it look like a miniature fruit.

meanings.definition: Having the form or shape of a berry.
meanings.sent1: The bacciform plant had clusters of tiny berries.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace had a beautiful bacciform pendant.
meanings.sent3: The bacciform chair cushion reminded him of a berry patch.
meanings.sent4: The bacciform balloons at the party made it feel like a garden.
meanings.sent5: The bacciform design on the fabric added a playful touch to the dress.
